poemsDataJson.list_full: 村雨(むらさめ)の 露(つゆ)もまだひぬ 真木(まき)の葉(は)に 霧(きり)立(た)ちのぼる 秋(あき)の夕暮(ゆふぐ)れ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: An autumn eve://See the valley mists arise//Among the fir leaves//That still hold the dripping wet//Of the chill day's sudden showers.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Murasame no|Tsuyu mo mada hinu|Maki no ha ni|Kiri tachi noboru|Aki no yūgure
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: きりたちのほる あきのゆふくれ
poemsDataJson.author: 寂蓮法師(じゃくれんほうし)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 霧が立ちのぼる秋の夕暮れの、静かで心寂しい情景
